text: Kōraā, ‘hē mānara! Tōmālōkē yadi mōra dbīna samparkē sandēha pōṣaṇa karaā tēntē jāni thōraā! Tōmālōkē āllāhara bāhiraē yisakalara ibādata karaā ma'i siham̐tara ibādata nakaraō. Baraṁ ma'i ibādata karaō āllāhara yijanē tōmālōkaka mr̥tyu pradāna karaē ārau ma'i ādiṣṭa haichō yē ma'i yātē muminasakalara antarbhukta ha'ōm̐’
